title: OFB Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in interview for 02 Medical Practitioner Posts
description: The Ordnance Factory Board (OFB) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 02 Medical Practitioner Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the OFB Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and...
